channel.title: How do I edit what it says on login? (562)
channel.description: Ok so i dled atomicscape then im wondering how to edit what it says at login in the chat box. Any1 help please. Thank you.

item.title: How do I edit what it says on login? (562)
item.dc:creator: @deleter164 deleter164
item.description:
@deleter164 wrote:

Yeah, for exmaple: When you logg in and it says something like “Welcome to atomicscape” you just go to “client.java” and click edit. then type in welcome where it says “find” and you shud find it. then compile and restart server and ur done

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit what it says on login? (562)

item.title: How do I edit what it says on login? (562)
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Go into client.java and search for it.
